about_the_game:
The Antitower is back, and if it is not stopped, it will be the end of human civilisation as we know it. The Pilots are the only ones able to use the old technology to end this threat once and for all. You are one of these Pilots and, with the help of very special individuals, you are best suited to carry out this arduous task.
You fight against dangerous enemies, who are fragments of the very Antitower you are trying to reach. Survive until the final level to discover all the secrets that lie behind this universe and behind the prey, or predator, you are trying to take down.

Features

Fire up your ship and take flight into this new universe. Space awaits you, but so do the dangers that lurk in it. Your goal is one, so don't let it slip away!
  • Old-fashioned side-scrolling space shooter.
  • A fearsome enemy to defeat, with hordes of enemies in tow.
  • A captivating story, full of developments right to the end.
  • A varied cast of characters that will better immerse you in the world of Starxia.

name: Starxia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2120 / AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 460 (1GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) / Intel® Iris Pro™ 580 / Intel® Iris® Plus G7 / AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1650 (4GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 390X (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Starxia is an old-fashioned side-scrolling space shooter. Step into the role of a Pilot and use your ship to eliminate hordes of fierce enemies. A compelling story and many interesting characters await you in this adventure. Take over the controls and fly into the vacuum of space. Let the hunt begin
